Las alergias respiratorias pueden crear, entre otras patologias atopicas, el asma. In Mexico, national development based on the oil industry has affected the soils and other natural resources in the southwest of the country. There are, however, no studies linking these effects with the equitable development the inhabitants of the polluted zones. Therefore, the objective of this study is to analyze, from a gender perspective, the social effects from the oil industry on the equitable development of the families in four areas of the ejidos of Huimanguillo, Tabasco (Rovirosa, El Paraiso, La Ceiba, and Gurria), located 0.5, 2.5, 7, and 12 kilometers to the south of the La Venta petrochemical plant.
